mapper.insert: insert into osf_jobInfo (jobTitle, jobField, jobRequiredTask, jobQualification, jobLocation, jobZipcode, jobWorkTime, jobPayType, jobPayAmount, jobBenefits, jobContent, comCall, comIntroduction, jobDueDate, jobApplyType, jobHomePageUrl, jobChargerName, jobChargerEmail, jobEtc) values(#{jobTitle}, #{jobField}, #{jobRequiredTask}, #{jobQualification}, #{jobLocation}, #{jobZipcode}, #{jobWorkTime}, #{jobPayType}, #{jobPayAmount}, #{jobBenefits}, #{jobContent}, #{comCall}, #{comIntroduction}, #{jobDueDate}, #{jobApplyType}, #{jobHomePageUrl}, #{jobChargerName}, #{jobChargerEmail}, #{jobEtc})
